TextBlock.Text: BASIL: After a short detour to Bruised Brother near the end of the loop, I encountered a revelation that just made my life all the more intresting!
BASIL: The small pores in the stone of this large planet seem to let liquids pass through, one of said liquids being Sunset Sister's compacted star.
BASIL: After the funnel between Sunset Sister and it opened, the sand in the shell was let out, starting to fill up the core with sand.
